column1: Funeral Services will be held Monday June 15
column2: 2015 at Loretto Sacred Heart Catholic Church at 10:00 AM with Father Luckas and Deacon Sammy Beckman officiating. with burial to follow in Loretto Sacred Heart Cemetery. Visitation will be held Sunday June 14
